HediffDef.label: voidshard cloak
HediffDef.description: An installed dark retro-reflection skin. With integrated revenant vertebrae, it can utilize multiple forms of invisibility, and its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard cloak has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade retro-reflection skin with revenant vertebrae
RecipeDef.description: Alter retro-reflective skin by merging it with a shards from a dark archotech and a set of revenant vertebrae. The host will have the invisibility-granting abilities of both implants, and their cooldowns will be shorter based on the current anomalous activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading retro-reflection skin with revenant vertebrae.

HediffDef.label: voidshard telescoping arm
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech telescoping arm. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard telescoping arm has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech telescoping arm with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech telescoping arm by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech telescoping arm with shards.

AbilityDef.label: voidshard lasso
AbilityDef.description: Grabs a distant object, creature, building, or tree. If the target is immobile or too heavy to carry, the caster is rapidly pulled to its location; otherwise, it is brought to the caster's position.\n\nOnly goes on cooldown if used to move the caster or another creature.

HediffDef.label: voidshard shield bubbler
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech shield bubbler. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard shield bubbler has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech shield bubbler with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech shield bubbler by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech shield bubbler with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard thinking spine
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech spine. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard thinking spine has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech thinking spine with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech thinking spine by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech thinking spine with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard undulating spine
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech spine that enables its host to somehow move through solid obstacles. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard undulating spine has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

As {PAWN_nameDef} died, the vile influence of {PAWN_possessive} implanted voidshard technology revealed itself. A horrific entity was subtly incubating within {PAWN_objective}, but it has now emerged!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech undulating spine with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech undulating spine by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech undulating spine with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard graviton spine
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech spine. Gains part efficiency for 5 days after flying on a gravship. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard graviton spine has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech graviton spine with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech graviton spine by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech graviton spine with shards.

HediffDef.label: archo-gravitic empowerment
HediffDef.description: A temporary state of improved efficiency.

HediffDef.label: voidshard earthshaker
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech earthshaker. When landing after a jump, it can release a shockwave that stuns and pains anyone nearby, produces smoke, and damages buildings. Its potency, including the radius of its shockwave, scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard earthshaker has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech earthshaker with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech earthshaker by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.

HediffDef.label: voidshard generator leg
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech generator leg. Affects abilities granted by other bionics. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard generator leg has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech generator leg with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech generator leg by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech generator leg with shards.

HediffDef.label: extra voidshard telescoping arm (left)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra dark archotech telescoping arm. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s extra voidshard telescoping arm has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: install extra voidshard telescoping arm (left)
RecipeDef.description: Alter an extra archotech telescoping arm by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading extra archotech telescoping arm with shards.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s extra voidshard telescoping arm has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.description: Alter an extra archotech telescoping arm by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading extra archotech telescoping arm with shards.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s extra voidshard shield bubbler has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s extra voidshard shield bubbler has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!
